page.title: 15Games And Hobbies
page.content: In our class we did a survey on games and hobbies in 1985. Badminton was the most popular game with 57 pts. Next was swimming with 28 pts. Football was 3rd with 19 pts (Football is the favourite game of boys, although girls like to play it as well). Netball was 4th with 16 pts. Then came tennis with 11 pts. Table Tennis recieved 9 pts, snooker recieved 5 pts, darts, pool and horse riding came 8th with 4 pts. Monopoly, bowls and chess were 9th with 2 pts each. And in 10th place was hill walking with 1 pt.
